channel.title: [562]How do you change the special attack cost?[Rs2hd]
channel.description: Hello, ive been wondering how u change the special amount cost, cuz i want to change that dds can use 50% or the special bar instead of 25%, and i want the ags to use 100% how u change?

item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

well first locate the special method like dd(s) look for 5698(the item id), now I dont know much about 562, maybe its done like this maybe its not but look for the if statements like

if(special > 25

Ima leave the spoon feeding to 562 users but look for 25 and change it to 50 and basically the same with ags.
